member.name: SMDATA
member.summary: Contains information from a menu band.

member.name: SMDATA.dwMask
member.summary: A mask that is always set to SMDM_HMENU.

member.name: SMDATA.hmenu
member.summary: The static menu portion of the menu band.

member.name: SMDATA.hwnd
member.summary: The HWND value of the owner window.

member.name: SMDATA.uId
member.summary: The identifier of the menu item. This value is -1 for the menu itself.

member.name: SMDATA.uIdParent
member.summary: The identifier of the parent menu.

member.name: SMDATA.punk
member.summary: A pointer to the interface of the MenuBand object.

member.name: SMDATA.pidlFolder
member.summary: The of the shell folder portion of the menu.

member.name: SMDATA.pidlItem
member.summary: The of the selected item in the shell folder portion of the menu.

member.name: SMDATA.psf
member.summary: A pointer to the interface for the folder associated with the shell folder portion of the menu.

member.name: SMDATA.pvUserData
member.summary: A pointer to a user-defined data structure.
